Name: insilicorun
description: increment each time you repeat in silico analysis

Name: mem
description: Memory in GB

Name: gccRoot
description: The root to tools and data used by the GCC

Name: #gccRoot
description: The root to tools and data used by the GCC

Name: toolDir
description: Base dir for tools

Name: molgenisComputeDir
description: Where you have MOLGENIS/compute the commandline script generator installed

Name: inhouseDir
description: Base dir for in-house sequencing projects

Name: allRawNgsDataDir
description: Contains all rawdata (i.e., *.fq files)

Name: allRawArrayDataDir
description: Contains all rawdata (i.e., Genome Studio files)

Name: projectAnalysisDir
description: Project folder for this in silico run

Name: projectRawNgsDataDir
description: Contains project specific rawdata (i.e., *.fq files)

Name: projectRawArrayDataDir
description: Contains project specific rawdata (i.e., Genome Studio files)

Name: projectJobsDir
description: Project specific job scripts directory

Name: projectLogsDir
description: Project specific log directory

Name: projectIntermediateDir
description: Store intermediate results here; empty at end of project.

Name: projectResultsDir
description: Store final results here; a sub set of the primary outputs that we want to keep/archive are moved to this dir; afterwards the remaining files from the intermediate dir will be lost when we clean up.

Name: fq
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: fq_1
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: fq_2
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: fq_barcode
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: fq_barcode_1
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files

Name: fq_barcode_2
description: use these in case of demultiplexed files
